Turkey says 12 soldiers killed in clashes with Kurdish militantsTwelve Turkish soldiers have been killed in the past two days in clashes with Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK) militants in northern Iraq, the defence ministry said on Saturday. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 16:27:50 GMT VL2A6YVYXRN75PMM6ND2CVU76E https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-says-12-soldiers-killed-clashes-with-kurdish-militants-2023-12-23/Reuters世界中东
Yemen's warring parties commit to ceasefire steps - U.N. special envoyThe Saudi-backed Yemeni government and Iran-aligned Houthis have both committed to steps towards a ceasefire, the U.N. special envoy for Yemen said on Saturday. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 16:13:31 GMT VYAD7I3FZBMTZKKUSOR5VWUVAM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemens-warring-parties-commit-ceasefire-steps-un-special-envoy-2023-12-23/Mohammed Ghobari世界中东
French airport provides makeshift base for Indians on grounded flightAround 300 Indian nationals who were on board a plane grounded in France on suspicion of human trafficking were being cared for on Saturday in the hall of an airport in the eastern region of Marne while an investigation was ongoing, a local official said. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 14:14:21 GMT LAAVYLP3DZOS3CHKJLZNF73LLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/french-airport-provides-makeshift-base-indians-grounded-flight-2023-12-23/Reuters世界印度
'Blasphemous' same-sex nativity scene angers conservatives in ItalyA church nativity scene which features two mothers of the Baby Jesus, instead of the conventional Mary and Joseph figurines, has sparked anger among conservative Catholics and politicians in Italy. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 13:09:18 GMT HAETT56Q4RMY7ATBVS7PIHG2YI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/blasphemous-same-sex-nativity-scene-angers-conservatives-italy-2023-12-23/Ciro De Luca世界欧洲
Congo opposition plans protest over disputed electionA group of Congolese opposition candidates have written to the governor of Kinshasa to say they will hold a joint protest next week over the country's disputed general election, as foreign embassies called on all sides to show restraint. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 13:01:17 GMT BKKEVBN62JNOXLGRRCOHSH7LSI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-opposition-candidates-plan-presidential-election-protest-2023-12-23/Yassin Kombi, Sonia Rolley世界非洲
Polish farmers to suspend protest at Ukraine border, truckers stay onPolish farmers will suspend a protest at the border crossing with Ukraine at Medyka from Sunday, but truckers will continue blockades at three other crossings over Christmas and will allow even fewer trucks to pass than earlier, they said on Saturday. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 12:50:49 GMT P3LTPFGDARJXNOWRWQA6FJFBUA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-farmers-suspend-protest-ukraine-border-truckers-stay-2023-12-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Egyptian, Iranian presidents discuss Gaza developments, restoring tiesThe presidents of Egypt and Iran discussed recent developments in Gaza and the prospect of restoring diplomatic ties between their two countries in what Iranian state television said on Saturday was their first phone call. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 12:31:27 GMT 4OEIJ73DIVOYNES7HGQZJWDJWE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/egyptian-iranian-presidents-discuss-gaza-developments-restoring-ties-2023-12-23/Reuters世界中东
Bells ring across Czech Republic to mourn victims of mass shootingFlags flew at half staff as people mourned the 14 people who died in the shooting at a Prague university. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 12:09:07 GMT HZBZARYG3RKTRK6SULW3SR27BQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/bells-ring-across-czech-republic-mourn-victims-mass-shooting-2023-12-23/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel-affiliated merchant vessel hit by aerial vehicle off IndiaAn Israel-affiliated merchant vessel was struck by an uncrewed aerial vehicle off India's west coast, British maritime security firm Ambrey said on Saturday, in the first such known attack so far away from the Red Sea since the Gaza war. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 11:47:52 GMT 5MZGKABA6FKMJLUXEQTPN4DQYQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/israel-affiliated-merchant-vessel-hit-by-aerial-vehicle-off-india-uk-firm-2023-12-23/Reuters市场商品
Yekaterina Duntsova barred from running against Putin in electionFormer TV journalist Yekaterina Duntsova was disqualified on Saturday as a candidate for Russia's next presidential election, preventing her from running against Vladimir Putin on a platform of opposition to the war in Ukraine. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 10:00:46 GMT JW2ROE5LV5IPRB4NMAENHH73UU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/would-be-putin-challenger-duntsova-barred-running-election-campaign-team-2023-12-23/Mark Trevelyan世界欧洲
Iran threatens Mediterranean closure over Gaza, without saying howAn Iranian Revolutionary Guards commander said the Mediterranean Sea could be closed if the United States and its allies continued to commit "crimes" in Gaza, Iranian media reported on Saturday, without explaining how that would happen. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 09:57:47 GMT H2DYAUTYCBOR7GOTDNSUCGSBKM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-threatens-mediterranean-closure-over-gaza-without-saying-how-2023-12-23/Reuters世界中东
